review: so far, it does what i expected it to do.  Movies, music, etc.
author: Lisa Price

review: Have 3 of these now & Love them.  We watch Amazon,  Netflix & Hulu & I like having them all in one place.  One stick did quit working after about a month but Amazon quickly & painlessly replaced it.
author: silver2

review: It took me quite a while to figure it out. I like it, but I thought there were more programs I could see and Netflix doesn't have the latest movies available like when I had them delivered. I'm I little disappointed.
author: Carol M. Petrozzello

review: Love it.  Wish there was a way to separate the free from pay movies and TV
author: Raymie "KNSulli"

review: Got my Fire TV Stick before 2 day a head of time and I is works great. This works better then I expected, I would tell everyone that it is a great buy.
author: Johnny Gerald
